title: What’s the First Step in Paying Off Debt? (Hour 3)
description:
George Kamel & Ken Coleman discuss:

Paying off debt while in college,

Avoiding borrowing money for an engagement ring,

What to do when you hate your job,

Preparing to take over a business,

Paying off the house or renovating.


Want a plan for your money? Find out where to start: https://bit.ly/3nInETX
Listen to all The Ramsey Network podcasts: https://bit.ly/3GxiXm6

Learn more about your ad choices. https://www.megaphone.fm/adchoices
Ramsey Solutions Privacy Policy
